articles.title: Gas prices slide as tankers head for Europe - live updates - The Telegraph
articles.description: Gas prices slumped this morning as a flotilla of US tankers headed for Europe to help ease the continent’s escalating energy crisis.
articles.content:
Good morning. 
We start with the latest figures from the SMMT, which show the UK's car industry recorded its worst November for output since 1984.
Output dropped 28.7pc last month to 75,756 units a… [+2099 chars]

articles.author: Amitabh Sinha
articles.title: Omicron tracker: AstraZeneca works on specific vaccine; WHO says variant in 106 countries - The Indian Express
articles.description: The newly-discovered fast-spreading Omicron variant has been behind the rapid surge in cases in Europe, Africa and the United States in the last one month. The variant has now spread to 106 countries, WHO reported.
articles.content: As new coronavirus cases continue to rise rapidly in many parts of the world, pharmaceutical major AstraZeneca said it had begun work on developing an Omicron-specific vaccine.“Together with Oxford U… [+3782 chars]
